org.apache.thrift.transport

Class TMemoryBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.thrift.transport.TTransport
      • org.apache.thrift.transport.TMemoryBuffer

  • public class TMemoryBuffer
extends TTransport
    Memory buffer-based implementation of the TTransport interface.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TMemoryBuffer(int size)
      Create a TMemoryBuffer with an initial buffer size of size.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TMemoryBuffer

        public TMemoryBuffer(int size)
        Create a TMemoryBuffer with an initial buffer size of size. The internal buffer will grow as necessary to accommodate the size of the data being written to it.
